archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0304
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a marketer, I want customers who own multiple products to specify a primary email as part of the signup journey, so that I can ensure we can communicate to them via email.

properties.value: Email address is not stored on product level in Comarch. So should not be an issue at all. If needed, we could also register multiple and mark one as primary.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
